text: ql -ayha alrswl- llnas: 'iinama 'umrt 'an 'aebud raba hadhih albldt, wahi "mk", aladhi harramha ealaa khalaqah 'ana ysfku fiha dmana hramana, 'aw yzlmu fiha ahdana, 'aw ysydu sydha, 'aw yaqtaeuu shjrha, walah subhanah kl shy', w'umrt 'an aebdh wahdah dun man swah, w'umrt 'an 'akun min almnqadyn lamrh, almbadryn ltaeth, wa'an 'atlu alquran ealaa alnas, faman ahtda bma fyh watabie ma jit bh, fa'iinama khayr dhlk wjzawh lnfsh, waman dll ean alhaqu faqul -ayha alrswl-: 'iinama 'ana nadhir lakum min eadhab allah weqabh 'iin lam twmnu, fa'ana wahid min alrusul aladhin 'undhiruu qwmhm, walays biadaya min alhdayt shy'
